data.title: Organize Home Office
data.desc: Sort through all documents, declutter the desk, and arrange office supplies. Ensure cables are managed properly and create a more efficient workspace.

data.title: Plan Weekly Meals
data.desc: Create a meal plan for the upcoming week, including breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Make a grocery list based on the planned meals and shop for all necessary ingredients.

data.title: Update Resume and LinkedIn Profile
data.desc: Review and update your resume with recent job experiences and skills. Ensure your LinkedIn profile reflects the changes and highlights your latest achievements.

data.title: Read a Book on Personal Development
data.desc: Choose a book on personal development that interests you. Set aside 30 minutes each day to read and take notes on key insights and actionable advice.
